title: BOM Window
desc: Browser Object Model (BOM) allows js to talk to the broswer.

desc: The window.screen object contains information about the user's screen.

title: BOM Window Location
desc: The window.location object can be used to get the current page address (URL) and to redirect the browser to a new page.

title: BOM Window History
desc: The window.history object contains the browsers history.

desc: The window.navigator object contains information about the visitor's browser.

desc: The window object allows execution of code at specified time intervals.
